entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, trying to defend himself against grindylows.

entities.name: grindylow
entities.description: A type of magical creature that is attacking Harry.

entities.name: wand
entities.description: Harry's wand, which he uses to defend himself against the grindylows.

entities.name: horned skull
entities.description: An object that Harry connects with his foot, allowing him to escape from the grindylows.

relationships.description: Harry is being attacked by the grindylows.
Harry uses his wand to defend himself against the grindylows.
Harry connects with the horned skull, allowing him to escape from the grindylows.
